languages.text: "Я помню тебя, маленький ксенос. Смотрю, в этой реальности ты тоже лишилась своего камня душ... но при этом осталась жива? Забавно. Забавно вспоминать, как ты и твои собратья молили о пощаде, когда, одного за другим, я отправлял{mf||а} вас на пир к Властелину Удовольствий".

"I remember you, little xenos. I see you have lost your spirit stone in this reality, too... and yet you survived? How amusing. As amusing as it is to recall how you and your kin begged for mercy as I sent you off, one after another, to the feast of the Lord of Pleasure."
languages.original_text: "Я помню тебя, маленький ксенос. Смотрю, в этой реальности ты тоже лишилась своего камня душ... но при этом осталась жива? Забавно. Забавно вспоминать, как ты и твои собратья молили о пощаде, когда, одного за другим, я отправлял{mf||а} вас на пир к Властелину Удовольствий".

traits.locale_text: "I remember you, little xenos. I see you have lost your Spirit Stone in this reality, too... and yet survived? That is amusing. As is remembering how you and your kin begged for mercy as I sent you off, one after another, to the feast of the Lord of Pleasure."
traits.speaker: RTChaosFemale

traits.locale_text: "I remember you, little xenos. I see you have lost your Spirit Stone in this reality, too... and yet survived? That is amusing. As is remembering how you and your kin begged for mercy as I sent you off, one after another, to the feast of the Lord of Pleasure."

traits.locale_text: "I remember you, little xenos. I see you have lost your spirit stone in this reality, too... and yet you survived? How amusing. As amusing as it is to recall how you and your kin begged for mercy as I sent you off, one after another, to the feast of the Lord of Pleasure."
traits.speaker: RTChaosFemale

languages.text: «Te recuerdo, pequeña xenos. Veo que en esta realidad también has perdido tu joya espiritual... pero ¿sigues viva? Es divertido. Tanto como recordar cómo tu gente y tú suplicasteis piedad conforme os enviaba uno a uno al banquete del Señor del Placer».
languages.original_text: "I remember you, little xenos. I see you have lost your spirit stone in this reality, too... and yet you survived? How amusing. As amusing as it is to recall how you and your kin begged for mercy as I sent you off, one after another, to the feast of the Lord of Pleasure."

traits.locale_text: «Te recuerdo, pequeña xenos. Veo que en esta realidad también has perdido tu joya espiritual... pero ¿sigues viva? Es divertido. Tanto como recordar cómo tu gente y tú suplicasteis piedad conforme os enviaba uno a uno al banquete del Señor del Placer».
traits.speaker: RTChaosFemale

languages.text: « Je me souviens de vous, xénos. Je vois que vous avez perdu votre pierre-esprit dans cette réalité également et pourtant... vous avez survécu ? Comme c'est amusant. Presque aussi amusant que de me remémorer la manière dont vos semblables et vous m'avez demandé grâce lorsque je vous ai envoyés, un à un, entre les mains du Prince du Plaisir. »
languages.original_text: "I remember you, little xenos. I see you have lost your spirit stone in this reality, too... and yet you survived? How amusing. As amusing as it is to recall how you and your kin begged for mercy as I sent you off, one after another, to the feast of the Lord of Pleasure."

traits.locale_text: « Je me souviens de vous, xénos. Je vois que vous avez perdu votre pierre-esprit dans cette réalité également et pourtant... vous avez survécu ? C'est amusant. Presque aussi amusant que de me remémorer la manière dont vous et vos semblables m'avez demandé grâce lorsque je vous ai envoyés, un à un, entre les mains du Prince du Plaisir. »
traits.speaker: RTChaosFemale

languages.text: 「お前のことは覚えてるよ、ちっぽけな異種族。この世界でも魂縛石をなくしたのか…だが、それでも生きているだと？何とも面白い。お前とお前の仲間を次から次へとロード・オヴ・プレジャーの饗宴に送ってやった時の慈悲を乞う姿は、思い出すたびに面白いよ」
languages.original_text: "I remember you, little xenos. I see you have lost your spirit stone in this reality, too... and yet you survived? How amusing. As amusing as it is to recall how you and your kin begged for mercy as I sent you off, one after another, to the feast of the Lord of Pleasure."

traits.locale_text: 「お前のことは覚えてるよ、ちっぽけな異種族。この世界でも魂縛石をなくしたのか…だが、それでも生きているだと？何とも面白い。お前とお前の仲間を次から次へとロード・オヴ・プレジャーの饗宴に送ってやった時の慈悲を乞う姿は、思い出すたびに面白いよ」
traits.speaker: RTChaosFemale

languages.text: “我记得你，小异形。看得出来，在这个世界中，你也一样失去了你的灵魂石……可你却活了下来？这可真有意思。我还记得，当我把你和你的族人一个个送到欢愉之主的盛宴时，你们是怎么跪在我面前祈求怜悯的，这真是太有意思了。”
languages.original_text: "I remember you, little xenos. I see you have lost your spirit stone in this reality, too... and yet you survived? How amusing. As amusing as it is to recall how you and your kin begged for mercy as I sent you off, one after another, to the feast of the Lord of Pleasure."

traits.locale_text: “我记得你，小异形。看得出来，在这个世界中，你也一样失去了你的灵魂石……可你却活了下来？这可真有意思。我还记得，当我把你和你的族人一个个送到欢愉之主的盛宴时，你们是怎么跪在我面前祈求怜悯的。”
traits.speaker: RTChaosFemale

languages.text: "Ich erinnere mich an Euch, kleine Xenos. Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr auch in dieser Realität Euren Seelenstein verloren ... und doch habt Ihr überlebt? Wie amüsant. So amüsant die Erinnerung daran auch ist, wie Ihr und Eure Sippe um Gnade gefleht habt, als ich Euch einen nach dem anderen zum Gelage des Lords der Vergnügungen geschickt habe."
languages.original_text: "I remember you, little xenos. I see you have lost your spirit stone in this reality, too... and yet you survived? How amusing. As amusing as it is to recall how you and your kin begged for mercy as I sent you off, one after another, to the feast of the Lord of Pleasure."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erinnere mich an Euch, kleine Xenos. Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr auch in dieser Realität Euren Seelenstein verloren ... und doch habt Ihr überlebt? Wie amüsant. Genau wie die Erinnerung daran, wie Ihr und Eure Sippe um Gnade gefleht haben, als ich Euch einen nach dem anderen zum Gelage des Lords der Vergnügungen geschickt habe."
traits.speaker: RTChaosFemale

languages.text: "Seni hatırlıyorum minik zeno. Bu gerçeklikte de ruh taşını kaybetmişsin... Fakat hayatta kalmayı başarmışsın. Ne hoş. Soydaşlarınla birlikte sizi teker teker Zevk Lordu'nun ziyafetine yollarken nasıl da merhamet için yalvardığınızı hatırlamak kadar hoş."
languages.original_text: "I remember you, little xenos. I see you have lost your spirit stone in this reality, too... and yet you survived? How amusing. As amusing as it is to recall how you and your kin begged for mercy as I sent you off, one after another, to the feast of the Lord of Pleasure."
